alert.note: Alert for Upper Koyukuk Valley (Alaska) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued February 21 at 3:36PM AKST until February 22 at 12:00PM AKST by NWS Fairbanks
info.description: ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL NOON AKST TUESDAY... * WHAT...Snow, and blowing snow with low visibility occurring. Plan on difficult travel conditions. Storm total snow accumulation 4 to 6 inches. Highway Summits will have winds gusting to 35 mph along with visibility one half mile or less at times. Large snow drifts will form. * WHERE...Upper Koyukuk Valley * WHEN...Until noon Tuesday. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...heavy snow is expected to develop tonight. Look for reduced visibilities at times. Winds gusting to 35 mph over highway summits causing blowing snow with low visibility. Snow and winds will taper off Tuesday afternoon. PRECAUTIONARY/PREPAREDNESS ACTIONS... A Winter Weather Advisory for snow means periods of snow will cause travel difficulties. The latest road conditions can be obtained by calling 5 1 1.
